town_halls.title: ERA Town Hall Meeting
town_halls.summary:
*Meeting with Enabling The Future*

# ERA Town Hall Meeting

**Date:** May 22, 2024 | **Duration:** 116 mins

**Links:** [View Meeting](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=view_recording_link&utm_medium=email) | [Ask Fathom](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=ask_fathom&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=ask_fathom&utm_medium=email)

## ACTION ITEMS ✨

- [ ] [Schedule Alex Carlin for presentation on his project at next ERA town hall meeting in 2 weeks](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=3680.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Begin planning ERA participation in Climate Week (Sept). Outline potential activities, reach out to members for ideas/involvement](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=5253.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Send white paper from Munich conference "Embracing Nature's Complexity" to ERA members when available](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=5781.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)


## Meeting Purpose

## Key Takeaways

- [Presentations on eco-restoration projects in Nigeria, Panama, Sierra Gorda (Mexico), and insights from a conference in Munich](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=55.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Discussion on financing mechanisms like carbon credits, local protocols, and digital monitoring](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=93.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Emphasis on preserving wilderness areas and understanding biotic pumps for climate regulation](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=835.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Need to promote disruptive science and community-funded research on topics like biotic cooling](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=6782.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Topics

### Nigeria School Project

- [Developing a "smart and green" school in Enugu State incorporating regenerative agriculture, indigenous wisdom into curriculum](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=611.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [1 acre regenerative farm per school, solar power, robotics lab, sustainable practices](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=774.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Collaborating with government, local leaders for long-term sustainability](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=756.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Panama Initiative

- [Aim to restore Panama watershed and moisture sources to refill Panama Canal](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=2760.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Exploring financing models like Sierra Gorda's local carbon protocol](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=4301.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Opportunity for ERA to facilitate collaborative projects](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=2717.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Sierra Gorda, Mexico

- [Local protocol developed for carbon credits - 80% income to landowners, lower monitoring costs](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=2930.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Digital registry and remote sensing to track project growth transparently](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=4363.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Successful in restoring forests, increasing incomes, reducing degradation](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=3439.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Munich Conference

- [Focus on preserving large forests like Amazon for biotic pump/moisture cycling](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=6030.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Concern over forest degradation disrupting this continental moisture transport](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=6129.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Need to promote disruptive science on biotic cooling that challenges climate models](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=6602.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Potential for community-funded research, annual prizes to drive new thinking](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=6677.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Next Steps

- [Follow up on Sierra Gorda model for Panama financing](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=4983.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Explore ERA participation in Climate Week (September)](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=6256.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Consider ways to promote disruptive science (prizes, community funding)](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=6820.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Schedule future presentations (e.g. Russ Speer, Alex Carlin's music project)](https://fathom.video/share/4b-Z3URGmwVJzG549B6RHvaw6uAaqkX_?tab=summary&timestamp=5568.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
